name: VaultInitializationModule
description: Rari Vault Initialization Module. Module for initializing newly created Vaults.

eventDecorators.name: ConfigModuleUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the config module is updated.

functionDecorators.name: configModule
functionDecorators.description: Vault configuration module used to configure Vaults before initialization.

functionDecorators.name: initializeVault
functionDecorators.description: Properly configures and initializes a newly deployed Vault. This will revert if the Vault has already been initialized.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to configure and initialize.

functionDecorators.name: setConfigModule
functionDecorators.description: Sets a new Vault configuration module.

parameterDecorators.name: newConfigModule
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault configuration module to set.
